nodes.text: Ardees Beverage Company was a beverage manufacturing company that produced the Moogan tea, Ardees Beverage. The company was caught up in a controversy when smuggled Ardees Beverage mixed with the potentially poisonous diluting agent slabin caused an outbreak of illness among schoolchildren on Mandalore. The incident was precipitated by an individual within the company who helped the smuggler Tee Va acquire the Ardees Beverage concentrate that caused the illness once mixed with slabin.
